/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, their greenery contrasting with the urban landscape. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
